name: ecobag
desc: EcoBag.vet is a community-powered DApp that rewards eco-conscious shoppers with B3TR tokens for making sustainable choices. Simply upload a picture of your reusable bag and receipt after shopping to earn rewards while reducing plastic waste. Built on VeChain and powered by VeBetterDAO, EcoBag.vet tracks your positive impact and offers real-world benefits, including redeemable NFTs for EcoBags. Join the movement toward a cleaner, greener future-one bag at a time.

name: Nubila
desc: Nubila is an innovative DePIN network that helps users earn rewards by collecting real-time hyperlocal weather data through decentralized weather devices and verifying the authenticity and validity of the data on the network.

name: Vyvo
desc: Experience the health revolution with Vyvo Smart Chain, where blockchain, IoT, and AI unite to transform how we manage well-being. We inspire individuals to actively monitor their health and, in return, reward them.

name: Bubbles
desc:

BUBBLES tracks the use of refillable water bottles and rewards users for sustainable behavior. Each verified scan helps reduce CO‚ÇÇ by replacing single-use plastic bottles.

name: EatGreen
desc:
EatGreen: The AWorld DApp That Rewards Sustainable Eating

EatGreen is a DApp developed by AWorld, the sustainability engagement platform used by the United Nations and the European Commission for their citizen awareness initiatives. Built within the VeBetterDAO ecosystem, EatGreen promotes eco-friendly eating habits by rewarding users with B3TR tokens for their contribution to sustainability.

How does it work?
1Ô∏è‚É£ Upload Your Dish ‚Äì Snap a photo of your meal and upload it through the app.
2Ô∏è‚É£ CO‚ÇÇeq Estimation ‚Äì Using AI-powered image recognition, EatGreen analyzes the ingredients and estimates the dish‚Äôs carbon footprint.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Earn B3TR Tokens ‚Äì The more sustainable your food choice, the more B3TR tokens you earn as a reward.

EatGreen combines AWorld‚Äôs expertise in sustainability engagement with blockchain transparency, fostering a conscious community committed to reducing the environmental impact of food. Users can track, improve, and get rewarded for their green choices‚Äîturning every meal into an opportunity to make a difference.

üåç Powered by AWorld ‚Äì Bringing sustainability to everyday actions.

Eat smart. EatGreen.

name: Carbonlarity
desc: Carbonlarity is a ReFi and DePin platform addressing carbon traceability in different scenarios. We combine blockchain technology with advanced IoT solutions to promote sustainability through real-time electricity monitoring and control.
